title: Environmental and Economic Impacts of the Coconut Industry

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of conducting a Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) for coconut products?
choices: To evaluate environmental impacts throughout a product's life
To determine the market price of coconuts
To assess the nutritional value of coconuts
questions.answer: To evaluate environmental impacts throughout a product's life

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a stage typically included in a Life Cycle Assessment?
What is the average carbon sequestration rate for coconut palms per hectare per year?
Which factor does NOT affect the carbon sequestration rate of coconut plantations?
What is a potential negative environmental impact of intensive coconut monoculture?
Which of the following is a key economic benefit of the coconut industry for rural communities in Timor-Leste?
What is a major challenge faced by coconut farmers in Timor-Leste?
choices: Oversupply of coconuts in the global market
Price volatility in the global market
Lack of demand for coconut products
questions.answer: Price volatility in the global market

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a coconut product in the module?

What role do coconut palms play in climate change mitigation?
choices: Absorbing and storing atmospheric carbon dioxide
questions.answer: Absorbing and storing atmospheric carbon dioxide

questions.question: Which factor is mentioned as hindering the growth potential of Timor-Leste's coconut industry?
choices: Limited access to modern farming techniques
questions.answer: Limited access to modern farming techniques
